author: Mahummad Ali
message: To be able to give away riches is mandatory if you wish to possess them. This is the only way that you will be truly rich.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: Learning without reflection is a waste, reflection without learning is dangerous.
title: Thought of the day

message: Don't fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bruce Lee
message: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
title: Thought of the day
